appendices/appendix-a-installation.title: Appendix A: Installation Guide
appendices/appendix-a-installation.description: This appendix provides detailed instructions for installing the required software and tools for working with the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

appendices/appendix-b-setup.title: Appendix B: Setup Guide
appendices/appendix-b-setup.description: This appendix provides detailed setup procedures for configuring your development environment to work with the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook examples.

appendices/appendix-c-troubleshooting.title: Appendix C: Troubleshooting Guide
appendices/appendix-c-troubleshooting.description: This appendix provides solutions to common problems encountered when working with Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics systems, particularly those using ROS 2, Gazebo, and NVIDIA Isaac.

appendices/appendix-e-code-templates.title: Appendix E: Code Templates
appendices/appendix-e-code-templates.description: This appendix provides reusable code templates for common tasks in Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics development using ROS 2, Gazebo, and NVIDIA Isaac.

appendices/appendix-g-resources.title: Appendix G: Instructor Resources
appendices/appendix-g-resources.description: This appendix provides resources and guidance for instructors teaching courses based on the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

ch10-vla-models/index.title: Chapter 10: Vision-Language-Action Models
ch10-vla-models/index.description: This chapter covers Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models in robotics, which integrate visual perception, natural language understanding, and motor control in unified frameworks.

ch11-humanoid-design/index.title: Chapter 11: Humanoid Robot Design and Control
ch11-humanoid-design/index.description: This chapter explores the principles of humanoid robot design, including mechanical structure, actuation systems, and control strategies specific to bipedal and multi-limbed humanoid robots.

ch12-learning-adaptation/index.title: Chapter 12: Learning and Adaptation in Robotics
ch12-learning-adaptation/index.description: This chapter covers machine learning techniques for robotics, including reinforcement learning, imitation learning, and adaptive control methods that enable robots to improve their performance over time.

ch13-multi-robot-systems/index.title: Chapter 13: Multi-Robot Systems and Coordination
ch13-multi-robot-systems/index.description: This chapter explores the coordination and control of multiple robots working together, including communication protocols, task allocation, and swarm intelligence approaches.

ch14-safety-ethics/index.title: Chapter 14: Safety and Ethics in Robotics
ch14-safety-ethics/index.description: This chapter addresses the critical issues of safety and ethics in robotics, including safety standards, ethical frameworks, and responsible development practices for AI-integrated robotic systems.

ch15-capstone-project/index.title: Chapter 15: Capstone Project - Autonomous Humanoid with VLA

getting-started/intro.title: Getting Started with Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
getting-started/intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive textbook on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics. This book provides a complete guide to understanding, developing, and implementing AI-integrated robotic systems with a focus on humanoid robots.

index.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook
index.description: Welcome to the comprehensive guide to Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics. This textbook covers the fundamental concepts, technologies, and applications of AI-integrated robotics with a focus on humanoid systems.

reference/api-reference.title: API Reference
reference/api-reference.description: This document provides detailed reference information for the ROS 2 interfaces, messages, and services used throughout the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

reference/dependencies.title: Cross-Chapter Dependencies
reference/dependencies.description: This document tracks the prerequisite relationships between chapters in the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

reference/glossary.title: Glossary
reference/glossary.description: This glossary defines key terms used throughout the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

reference/hardware-specs.title: Hardware Specifications and Reference Tables
reference/hardware-specs.description: This reference provides detailed specifications for common robotics hardware platforms, sensors, actuators, and computing systems used in Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics.

reference/quiz-template.title: Quiz Template
reference/quiz-template.description: This document provides the standard template for chapter quizzes in the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.
